verses.text: \w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*, \w and|strong="H3651"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* seemly \w for|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* flying \w to|strong="H0935"\w* other \w places|strong="H3651"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w sparrow|strong="H6833"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w here|strong="H3651"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* there: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* uttered \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* man.

A \w whip|strong="H7752"\w* for a \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H2543"\w* a snaffle for an ass, \w and|strong="H2543"\w* a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* for \w the|strong="H7626"\w* back \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* according \w to|strong="H1571"\w* \w his|strong="H1571"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w made|strong="H1571"\w* like him.

\w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* he imagine himself \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* sendeth \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* messenger, \w is|strong="H3027"\w* lame \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* drinketh iniquity.

As \w a|strong="H6310"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w man|strong="H6455"\w* hath fair \w legs|strong="H7785"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* vain: \w so|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H6310"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* unseemly \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6310"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* casteth \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heap|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0068"\w* Mercury: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* giveth honour \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5927"\w* if \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w thorn|strong="H2336"\w* should \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w drunkard|strong="H7910"\w*: \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

Judgment determineth causes: \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* putteth \w a|strong="H3605"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* silence, appeaseth anger.

As \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* returneth \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w vomit|strong="H6892"\w*, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* repeateth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.

Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* conceit? there \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* slothful man saith: There \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H0996"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H0996"\w* lioness \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w roads|strong="H1870"\w*.

As \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* turneth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* hinges, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* doth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* slothful \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* slothful hideth \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* armpit, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* grieveth \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w wiser|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* conceit, than \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* speak sentences.

\w As|strong="H2388"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* taketh \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* meddleth \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* manâ€™s \w quarrel|strong="H7379"\w*.
As \w he|strong="H4194"\w* \w is|strong="H4194"\w* guilty \w that|strong="H2671"\w* shooteth \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, \w and|strong="H4194"\w* lances unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*:

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* hurteth \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* deceitfully: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* taken, saith: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* jest.

When \w the|strong="H0369"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* faileth, \w the|strong="H0369"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w go|strong="H3518"\w* \w out|strong="H0784"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* when \w the|strong="H0369"\w* talebearer \w is|strong="H0369"\w* taken \w away|strong="H0369"\w*, \w contentions|strong="H4066"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w cease|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0376"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, so \w an|strong="H0376"\w* angry \w man|strong="H0376"\w* stirreth up \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* talebearer \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* simple, \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* reach \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w innermost|strong="H2315"\w* \w parts|strong="H2315"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.

Swelling \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* joined \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* corrupt \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w like|strong="H3701"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H2789"\w* \w adorned|strong="H6823"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w dross|strong="H5509"\w*.

An \w enemy|strong="H8130"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* known \w by|strong="H8193"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, when \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w heart|strong="H7130"\w* \w he|strong="H7130"\w* entertaineth \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* speak low, \w trust|strong="H0539"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* there \w are|strong="H3820"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* mischiefs \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

He \w that|strong="H6951"\w* covereth \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* deceitfully, \w his|strong="H1540"\w* malice \w shall|strong="H6951"\w* be \w laid|strong="H1540"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w in|strong="H6951"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* public \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* diggeth \w a|strong="H7725"\w* \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* rolleth \w a|strong="H7725"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3956"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* loveth not truth: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3956"\w* slippery \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* worketh \w ruin|strong="H4072"\w*.
